name: Sonic_Dispersion
display_help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The SonicDispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
display_target_help: The Sonic Bubble is granting you Resistance to all types of damage as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.

name: Sonic_Siphon
display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken his Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.

name: Dreadful_Wail
display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -Recovery
display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

name: Resistance
display_help: The Eye of Merulina cannot be moved. It is resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear, Confuse, Teleport and psionic and all damage.
display_short_help: Auto Res Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear, Confuse, Teleport, All Dam
display_target_help: The Eye of Merulina cannot be moved. It is resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear, Confuse, Teleport and psionic and all damage.
display_target_short_help: Auto Res Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear, Confuse, Teleport, All Dam

name: Sonic_Dispersion
display_help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
display_target_help: The Sonic Bubble is granting you Resistance to all types of damage as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.
display_target_short_help: +Res(All Damage but Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

name: Shriek
display_help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target and weakening his Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: The sonic Shriek has weakened you. You are more vulnerable to damage.
